description:
Yorumun begins hijacking popular streamers` videos, rapidly escalating the commotion around her. Adashino tries to save Nodoka, but Nodoka refuses his help, defending Yorumun instead. Then Uname brings a woman in a wheelchair to meet them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Live Performance, a Curse, and the Person Inside
Live to Noroi to Naka no Hito
ライブと呪いと中の人
